final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Support
        A([Solve problems]) --> B[Ticket receive]
        B --> D{{XORGateway}}
        D -->|No| C[Solve the problem without involving the customer]
        D -->|Yes| E[Contacting the customer]
        C --> L[Problem solved]
        E --> F[Detailed interview on the problem]
        F --> G[Connecting to the client of the customer]
        G --> H[Ask for further information]
        H --> I{{XORGateway}}
        I -->|No| L[Problem solved]
        I -->|Yes| K[Solve problem]
        K --> H
        L --> M[Create notes for documentation]
        M --> N[Confirmation ticket completed]
        N --> O([Problems solved])
    end
    B -.->|Ticket| B
    E -.->|Email| E
    G -.->|Remote maintenance| G
    K -.->|Remote maintenance| K
    M -.->|Ticket system| M
    N -.->|Ticket| N
